trans-unit.source: Represents the table drawn by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> control at run time.
trans-unit.target: 으로 그린 테이블을 나타내는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"> </xref> 런타임 시 컨트롤입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> control displays data in the form of a grid.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>컨트롤을 표 형태로 데이터를 표시 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The DataGridTableStyle is a class that represents the drawn grid only.
trans-unit.target: DataGridTableStyle은 그려진된 모눈을 나타내는 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: This grid should not be confused with the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> class, which is a possible source of data for the grid.
trans-unit.target: 이 표와 일치 하지 않습니다는 <xref:System.Data.DataTable>클래스 표에 대 한 데이터의 가능한 원본인.</xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: Instead, the DataGridTableStyle strictly represents the grid as it is painted in the control.
trans-unit.target: 대신,는 DataGridTableStyle 엄격 하 게 나타냅니다 표를 컨트롤에서 그려질 때.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, through the DataGridTableStyle you can control the appearance of the grid for each <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: 따라서는 DataGridTableStyle을 통해 제어할 수 있습니다 각 <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.</xref:System.Data.DataTable> 눈금의 모양

trans-unit.source: To specify which DataGridTableStyle is used when displaying data from a particular <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> to the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> of a <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: 있는 DataGridTableStyle을 지정 하는 경우에 사용된 데이터를 표시는 특히 <xref:System.Data.DataTable> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>는 <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.</xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> 를</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> 설정,</xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection> retrieved through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A> property contains all the DataGridTableStyle objects used by a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>통해 검색는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A>속성에서 사용 하는 모든 DataGridTableStyle 개체를 포함 한 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>컨트롤.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>

trans-unit.source: The collection can contain as many DataGridTableStyle objects as you need, however the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> of each must be unique.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션은 만큼 DataGridTableStyle 개체를 필요한 만큼 포함할 수 있지만 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>각각의 고유 해야 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>

trans-unit.source: At run time, this allows you to substitute a different DataGridTableStyle for the same data, depending on the user's preference.
trans-unit.target: 런타임 시이 있습니다를 대체할 사용자의 기본 설정에 따라 동일한 데이터에 대 한 다른 DataGridTableStyle.

trans-unit.source: To do this: 1.
trans-unit.target: 이렇게 하려면: 1입니다.

trans-unit.source: Populate the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection> with DataGridTableStyle objects.
trans-unit.target: 채우기의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>DataGridTableStyle 개체와.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>

trans-unit.source: If a DataGridTableStyle exists in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection> whose <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> property value equals the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> object's <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> property, the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> is displayed with this DataGridTableStyle.
trans-unit.target: DataGridTableStyle에 있는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>인 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>속성 값이는 <xref:System.Data.DataTable>개체의 <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A>속성에는 <xref:System.Data.DataTable>이 DataGridTableStyle와 함께 표시 됩니다.</xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>

trans-unit.source: If no DataGridTableStyle exists with a matching <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>, the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> is displayed with the default style for data grid tables.
trans-unit.target: 없는 DataGridTableStyle 있는 일치 하는 경우 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>, <xref:System.Data.DataTable>데이터 표 테이블에 대 한 기본 스타일으로 표시 됩니다.</xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>

trans-unit.source: When a different grid style is needed, use the `Item` property to select the appropriate DataGridTableStyle (pass the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.Item%2A> property) and set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> of the returned object to a new value.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여 다른 표 스타일 필요할 때는 `Item` 속성을 적절 한 DataGridTableStyle 선택 (전달는 <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A>에 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.Item%2A>속성) 설정 하 고는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>을 새 값으로 반환된 된 개체의.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.Item%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.Item%2A> property to select the desired DataGridTableStyle, and set its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> to the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> of the <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.Item%2A>속성을 원하는 DataGridTableStyle을 선택 하 고 해당 설정 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>의 <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.</xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> 를</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.Item%2A> 사용 하 여

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Always create <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects and add them to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> before adding DataGridTableStyle objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>개체에 추가 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection> DataGridTableStyle 개체를 추가 하기 전에</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> 항상 만들기

trans-unit.source: When you add an empty DataGridTableStyle with a valid <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> value to the collection, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects are automatically generated for you.
trans-unit.target: 올바른는 빈 DataGridTableStyle을 추가할 때 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>를 컬렉션에 값 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>개체가 자동으로 생성 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Consequently, an exception will be thrown if you try to add new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects with duplicate <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> values to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 새 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>중복 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> 값</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> 을 가진 개체</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> 를 추가 하려고 하면 예외가 throw 될 결과적으로,

trans-unit.source: To determine which DataGridTableStyle is currently displayed, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> to return a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>.
trans-unit.target: DataGridTableStyle은 현재 결정 하기 위해 표시를 사용 하 여 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>에 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> 반환할</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> 속성</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the data source implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypedList> interface, you can use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypedList.GetListName%2A> method to return the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> of the current table.
trans-unit.target: 데이터 원본 구현 하는 경우는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypedList>사용할 수 있습니다 인터페이스는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypedList.GetListName%2A>반환 하는 메서드는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>현재 테이블의.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypedList.GetListName%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypedList>

trans-unit.source: This is shown in the C# code below: ``` private void PrintCurrentListName(DataGrid myDataGrid){ CurrencyManager myCM = (CurrencyManager) BindingContext[myDataGrid.DataSource, myDataGrid.DataMember]; IList myList = myCM.List; ITypedList thisList = (ITypedList) myList; Console.WriteLine(thisList.GetListName(null)); } ``` If the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> contains <xref:System.Data.DataTable> objects related through <xref:System.Data.DataRelation> objects, and the currently displayed <xref:System.Data.DataTable> is a child table, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A> will return a string in the form of TableName.RelationName (in the simplest case).
trans-unit.target: 아래의 C# 코드에서이 확인할: ``` private void PrintCurrentListName(DataGrid myDataGrid){ CurrencyManager myCM = (CurrencyManager) BindingContext[myDataGrid.DataSource, myDataGrid.DataMember]; IList myList = myCM.List; ITypedList thisList = (ITypedList) myList; Console.WriteLine(thisList.GetListName(null)); } ``` 경우는 <xref:System.Data.DataSet>포함 <xref:System.Data.DataTable>개체를 통해 관련 <xref:System.Data.DataRelation>개체 및 현재 표시 된 <xref:System.Data.DataTable>은 자식 테이블의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A>(가장 간단한 경우)에서 TableName.RelationName 형식의 문자열을 반환 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataRelation> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> is further down in the hierarchy, the string will consist of the parent table's name followed by the necessary <xref:System.Data.DataRelation.RelationName%2A> values required to reach the table's level.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Data.DataTable>하위 문자열의 계층 구조에서 부모 테이블의 이름 뒤에 필요한 구성 됩니다 <xref:System.Data.DataRelation.RelationName%2A>테이블의 수준에 도달 하는 데 필요한 값.</xref:System.Data.DataRelation.RelationName%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: For example, imagine three <xref:System.Data.DataTable> objects in a hierarchical relationship named (top to bottom) `Regions`, `Customers`, and `Orders`, and two <xref:System.Data.DataRelation> objects named `RegionsToCustomers` and `CustomersToOrders`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A> property will return "Regions.RegionsToCustomers.CustomersToOrders".
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어&3; 개의 한다고 가정 <xref:System.Data.DataTable>계층 이라는 관계 (위에서 아래로)에 개체 `Regions`, `Customers`, 및 `Orders`와 두 개의 <xref:System.Data.DataRelation>개체의 명명 된 `RegionsToCustomers` 및 `CustomersToOrders`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A>속성은 "Regions.RegionsToCustomers.CustomersToOrders"를 반환 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataRelation> </xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: However, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> will then be "Orders".
trans-unit.target: 그러나는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>"Orders" 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The collection of DataGridTableStyle objects is returned through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: DataGridTableStyle 개체의 컬렉션이 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A>있는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> 의 속성</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A> 을 통해 반환 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: When a DataGridTableStyle is displayed, the settings for the DataGridTableStyle will override the settings for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> control.
trans-unit.target: DataGridTableStyle에 대 한 설정에 대 한 설정을 재정의 합니다는 DataGridTableStyle 표시 되 면는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>컨트롤.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If a value is not set for a particular DataGridTableStyle property, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> control's value will be used instead.
trans-unit.target: 특정 DataGridTableStyle 속성에 값이 설정 되지 않은 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>컨트롤의 값이 대신 사용 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The following list shows the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> properties that can be set to override <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> control properties: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.AllowSorting%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.AlternatingBackColor%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.BackColor%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.ColumnHeadersVisible%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.ForeColor%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.GridLineColor%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.GridLineStyle%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.HeaderBackColor%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.HeaderFont%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.HeaderForeColor%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.LinkColor%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.PreferredColumnWidth%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.PreferredRowHeight%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.ReadOnly%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.RowHeadersVisible%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.RowHeaderWidth%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.SelectionBackColor%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.SelectionForeColor%2A> To bind the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> to a strongly typed array of objects, the object type must contain public properties.
trans-unit.target: 다음 목록에서는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>재정의를 설정할 수 있는 속성 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>컨트롤 속성:- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.AllowSorting%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.AlternatingBackColor%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.BackColor%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.ColumnHeadersVisible%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.ForeColor%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.GridLineColor%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.GridLineStyle%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.HeaderBackColor%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.HeaderFont%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.PreferredRowHeight%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.ReadOnly%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.RowHeadersVisible%2A>- </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.SelectionForeColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.SelectionBackColor%2A> trans-unit.source: To create a DataGridTableStyle that displays the array, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `typename` where `typename` is replaced by the name of the object type.
trans-unit.target: 배열을 표시 하는 DataGridTableStyle를 만들려면 설정는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성을 `typename` 여기서 `typename` 개체 유형의 이름으로 바뀝니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Also note that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> property is case-sensitive; the type name must be matched exactly.
trans-unit.target: 또한는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>속성은 대/소문자 구분; 형식 이름은 정확히 일치 해야 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> property for an example.
trans-unit.target: 참조는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>예에 대 한 속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also bind the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> to an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>.</xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> 에</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> 바인딩할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: A feature of the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> is that it can contain objects of multiple types, but the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> can only bind to such a list when all items in the list are of the same type as the first item.
trans-unit.target: 기능은 <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>여러 종류의 개체를 포함할 수는 있지만 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>목록의 모든 항목이 첫 번째 항목으로 같은 유형의 경우에 이와 같은 목록이 바인딩할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> </xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>

trans-unit.source: This means that all objects must either be of the same type, or they must inherit from the same class as the first item in the list.
trans-unit.target: 즉, 동일한 유형의 모든 개체 여야 하거나 목록에서 첫 번째 항목으로 동일한 클래스에서 상속 해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the first item in a list is a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>, the second item could be a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> (which inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>).
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 첫 번째 항목 목록에는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>, 두 번째 항목 수는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>(에서 상속 되 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>

trans-unit.source: If, on the other hand, the first item is a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>, the second object cannot be a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>.
trans-unit.target: 이면, 반면에 첫 번째 항목에 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>두 번째 개체에 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> 일 수 없습니다</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: Further, the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> must have items in it when it is bound and the objects in the DataGridTableStyle must contain public properties.
trans-unit.target: 또한는 <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>바인딩된는 DataGridTableStyle에서 개체 공용 속성을 포함 해야 하는 경우에 항목을 보유 해야 합니다.</xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>

trans-unit.source: An empty <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> will result in an empty grid.
trans-unit.target: 빈 <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>빈 그리드가 발생 합니다.</xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>

trans-unit.source: When binding to an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> of the DataGridTableStyle to "ArrayList" (the type name).
trans-unit.target: 에 바인딩할 때는 <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>로 설정 된 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>"ArrayList" (형식 이름)을 DataGridTableStyle의.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> </xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>모든 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>개체가 생성 됩니다. 한 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection> 에 추가 되</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> 는 잘못 된</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> 경우 자동으로</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> 한 컬렉션이</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> 개체</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> 를 추가 하지 않고</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> 만드는 경우

trans-unit.source: An exception will be thrown if you attempt to add <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects with duplicate <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A> values to the collection.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name used to map this table to a specific data source.
trans-unit.target: 이 테이블을 특정 데이터 소스에 매핑하는 데 사용 하는 이름을 설정 하거나 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: To bind the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> to a strongly typed array of objects, the object type must contain public properties.
trans-unit.target: 바인딩하는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>개체 유형을 개체의 강력한 형식의 배열에 public 속성을 포함 해야 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: To create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> that displays the array, set the MappingName property to `typename` where `typename` is replaced by the name of the object type.
trans-unit.target: 만들려는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>배열을 표시 하는, MappingName 속성을 설정 `typename` 여기서 `typename` 개체 유형의 이름으로 바뀝니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>

trans-unit.source: Also note that the MappingName property is case-sensitive; the type name must be matched exactly.
trans-unit.target: 또한 참고를 MappingName 속성은 대/소문자를 구분 합니다. 형식 이름은 정확히 일치 해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: See the MappingName property for an example.
trans-unit.target: 예를 보려면 MappingName 속성을 참조 하십시오.

trans-unit.source: You can also bind the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> to an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>.</xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> 에</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> 바인딩할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: A feature of the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> is that it can contain objects of multiple types, but the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> can only bind to such a list when all items in the list are of the same type as the first item.
trans-unit.target: 기능은 <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>여러 종류의 개체를 포함할 수는 있지만 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>목록의 모든 항목이 첫 번째 항목으로 같은 유형의 경우에 이와 같은 목록이 바인딩할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> </xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>

trans-unit.source: This means that all objects must either be of the same type, or they must inherit from the same class as the first item in the list.
trans-unit.target: 즉, 동일한 유형의 모든 개체 여야 하거나 목록에서 첫 번째 항목으로 동일한 클래스에서 상속 해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the first item in a list is a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>, the second item could be a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> (which inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>).
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 첫 번째 항목 목록에는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>, 두 번째 항목 수는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>(에서 상속 되 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>

trans-unit.source: If, on the other hand, the first item is a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>, the second object cannot be a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>.
trans-unit.target: 이면, 반면에 첫 번째 항목에 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>두 번째 개체에 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> 일 수 없습니다</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: Further, the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> must have items in it when it is bound.
trans-unit.target: 또한는 <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>바인딩될 때 항목이에 있어야 합니다.</xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>

trans-unit.source: An empty <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> will result in an empty grid.
trans-unit.target: 빈 <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>빈 그리드가 발생 합니다.</xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>

trans-unit.source: When binding to an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>, set the MappingName of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> to "ArrayList" (the type name).
trans-unit.target: 에 바인딩할 때는 <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>의 MappingName 설정는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>"ArrayList" (형식 이름)을.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> </xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>

trans-unit.source: The default is the name of the list managed by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> for this grid.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 관리 하는 목록 이름을 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>이 표에 대 한.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> is set using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>에 대 한는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>사용 하 여 설정 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.%23ctor%2A>생성자.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingNameChanged>이벤트 MappingName 값이 변경 될 때 발생 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingNameChanged>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.AllowSortingChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 발생 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.AllowSortingChanged"> </xref> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트를 발생 시키는 대리자를 통해 이벤트 처리기를 호출 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조 [NIB: 이벤트를 발생 시키는](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2)합니다.

trans-unit.source: The OnAllowSortingChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnAllowSortingChanged 메서드는 파생된 클래스가 대리자를 연결 하지 않고도 이벤트를 처리할를 수도 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 이 파생된 클래스에서 이벤트를 처리 하는 기본 방법입니다.

trans-unit.target: 새 모눈이 표시 될 때 열을 만드는 데 사용 되는 너비를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The width used to create columns when a new grid is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 새 모눈이 표시 될 때 열을 만드는 사용 되는 너비입니다.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.PreferredColumnWidth*> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: 발생 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.PreferredColumnWidth*>속성 값이 변경.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.PreferredColumnWidth*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height used to create a row when a new grid is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 새 모눈이 표시 될 때 행을 만드는 데 높이 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The preferred height is the minimum height needed to accommodate the displayed text with the assigned <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.HeaderFont%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 기본 설정된 높이 할당 된 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.HeaderFont%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.HeaderFont%2A> 로 표시 된 텍스트를 수용 하기 위해 필요한 최소 높이

trans-unit.source: A row will not be created with a height less than the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 행을 지정된 된 값 보다 작은 높이로 만들어지지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: If the font size requires it, however, the row height may be greater than the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 그러나 글꼴 크기에 필요한 경우 행 높이 지정된 된 값 보다 큰 수 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The height of a row, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 픽셀 단위로 행의 높이입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether columns can be edited.
trans-unit.target: 열을 편집할 수 있는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: You can also specify whether individual columns within the table are editable by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> class's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.ReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to an appropriate value, `true` or `false`.
trans-unit.target: 설정 하 여 테이블 내에서 개별 열 편집 가능한 지 여부를 지정할 수도 있습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>클래스의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.ReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성을 적절 한 값을 `true` 또는 `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.ReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, to ensure that the data is not edited, you can set the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> class's <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ReadOnly%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 또는 데이터를 편집 하지 되도록 설정할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>클래스의 <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ReadOnly%2A>속성을 `true`.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ReadOnly%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, if columns cannot be edited; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>열을 편집할 수 없으면; 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether row headers are visible.
trans-unit.target: 행 머리글이 표시 되는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: When row headers are visible, a plus sign is displayed in each row header if the underlying <xref:System.Data.DataTable> has a related child table.
trans-unit.target: 행 머리글이 표시 되 면 더하기 기호를 경우 각 행 머리글에 표시 되는 기본 <xref:System.Data.DataTable>관련된 자식 테이블에.</xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: This property will not function until you add <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성에는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>개체에 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection> 를</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> 추가할 때까지 작동 하지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: Until then, setting this property will have no effect.
trans-unit.target: 그때까지이 속성을 설정할 효과가 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if row headers are visible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>합니다.
